isis.stitle: ALLISON WT TRANSMISSION ELECTRONIC CONTROLS - ELECTRICAL OPERATION - SPEEDOMETER INPUT FROM ECU

svcproc.title: SPEEDOMETER INPUT FROM ECU
svcproc.para: With the WT transmission, the electronic speedometer positive input signal comes from the transmission output speed sensor. The sensor sends the signal to the WT ECU, then on the transmission harness, through the cab harness to cluster connector (27-5). The speedometer signal is an AC signal similar to the signal from the speedometer sensor in other International model vehicles. The minimum voltage range is 0 to 0.5 volts and the maximum output is approximately 5.0 volts.
